attributes.action: Demand for the single market in the brexit negotiations no matter what
attributes.additional_details: There is already talks of companies removing thousands of jobs from UK to other EU states. UK will likely break up due to Scotland pressing for referendum of split, and Northern Ireland wanting unification, also the London independence campaign. For this to stop we need the Government to act to secure a deal that will be beneficial for our future.
attributes.background: We need the single market deal for Britain to thrive in businesses, and so that there is minimal job losses in all parts of the UK. We urge the next government to secure a single market deal with the EU, at no matter what the cost is. We need to think about the future and our youths.
